fullContent: Home› First Person ShooterFPS SimulatorBy OnlineGames.io Wear your military uniform, and you're ready for intense battles! FPS Simulator is an action game where you will take part in a vast military arena. Many soldiers will be against you. Take them down one by one alongside your teammates, or act solely in the Deathmatch mode. It's up to you! Give your soldier a name from the menu and fight with the opponents in this FPS game.Before entering the battlefield, you must adjust the game settings according to your wishes. You can start by determining whether you want to fight alone or in teams. Then, choose your battling arena: Military 1 and Military 2. Both of them are large arenas offering many hide-and-seek places.There are also many roofs where you can go up and shoot them with a sniper. After setting the maximum number of players, you can now take your place in the game.ControlsWASD or Arrow Keys: MoveLeft-Click: ShootRight-Click: AimR Key: ReloadSpacebar: JumpCTRL Key: Crouch1-9 Number Keys or Mouse Scroll: Switch WeaponsESC or Tab Key: PauseUse the Roofs!In the Military-1 and Military-2 arenas, there are huge water tanks, factory buildings and military buildings with roofs. We recommend you climb the ladders and go up one of the roofs. Grab your sniper rifle by using the number keys on your keyboard. Find the best area to aim and crouch. Take down all your enemies from here with your beloved gun. If you are playing the game, especially in the Deathmatch mode, this strategy will take you to the top of the leaderboard.Wide Array of ArsenalsThis action game offers you a great deal of weaponry. You will find a deagle, a shotgun, a sniper rifle and many more. You can use your 1-9 number keys or mouse scroll to switch between weapons. Try each of the weapons and find your favorite one. Considering the situation, you may also determine which weapon you want to use. If the number of the opponents outnumber you in an arena, then go with grenades or bazooka.MP5KA4DeagleM67M79M87TBallistic KnifeRPGBlaser R93STW-25DeveloperFreezeNova developed the FPS Simulator.Search for MoreYou may also try Army Combat.
